name: KJV_BeStillGod
title: Keep not thou silence, O God: hold not thy peace, and be not still, O God.
description: Keep not thou silence, O God: hold not thy peace, and be not still, O God.

name: KJV_BeStillGod
title: Be still, and know that I am God: I will be exalted among the heathen, I will be exalted in the earth.
description: Be still, and know that I am  God: I will be exalted among the heathen, I will be exalted in the earth.

name: KJV_BeStillGod
title: And they also, if they abide not still in unbelief, shall be graffed in: for God is able to graff them in again.
description: And they also, if they abide not still in unbelief, shall be graffed in: for God is able to graff them in again.

name: KJV_BeStillGod
title: And Jesus stood still, and commanded him to be called. And they call the blind man, saying unto him, Be of good comfort, rise; he calleth thee.
description: And Jesus stood still, and commanded him to be called. And they call the blind man, saying unto him, Be of good comfort, rise; he calleth thee.

name: KJV_BeStillGod
title: And they said, Arise, that we may go up against them: for we have seen the land, and, behold, it is  very good: and  are  ye still? be not slothful to go,  and  to enter to possess the land.
description: And they said, Arise, that we may go up against them: for we have seen the land, and, behold, it is  very good: and  are  ye still? be not slothful to go,  and  to enter to possess the land.

name: KJV_BeStillGod
title: Why do we sit still? assemble yourselves, and let us enter into the defenced cities, and let us be silent there: for the LORD  our God hath put us to silence, and given us water of gall to drink, because we have sinned against the  LORD .
description: Why do we sit still? assemble yourselves, and let us enter into the defenced cities, and let us be silent there: for the LORD  our God hath put us to silence, and given us water of gall to drink, because we have sinned against the  LORD .

name: KJV_BeStillGod
title: Ye shall not need  to fight in this  battle:  set yourselves, stand ye  still , and see the salvation of the  LORD  with you, O Judah and Jerusalem: fear not, nor be dismayed; to morrow go out against them: for the  LORD   will be  with you.
description: Ye shall not need  to fight in this  battle:  set yourselves, stand ye  still , and see the salvation of the  LORD  with you, O Judah and Jerusalem: fear not, nor be dismayed; to morrow go out against them: for the  LORD   will be  with you.

name: KJV_BeStillGod
title: And Absalom answered Joab, Behold, I sent unto thee, saying, Come hither, that I may send thee to the king, to say, Wherefore am I come from Geshur? it had been  good for me  to have been  there still: now therefore let me see the king?s face; and if there be  any  iniquity in me, let him kill me.
description: And Absalom answered Joab, Behold, I sent unto thee, saying, Come hither, that I may send thee to the king, to say, Wherefore am I come from Geshur? it had been  good for me  to have been  there still: now therefore let me see the king?s face; and if there be  any  iniquity in me, let him kill me.
